name: Visibility
desc: Whether to show or hide a child.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget to show or hide, as controlled by [visible].

fields.name: replacement
fields.desc: The widget to use when the child is not [visible], assuming that none of the `maintain` flags (in particular, [maintainState]) are set.

fields.name: visible
fields.desc: Switches between showing the [child] or hiding it.

fields.name: maintainState
fields.desc: Whether to maintain the [State] objects of the [child] subtree when it is not [visible].

fields.name: maintainAnimation
fields.desc: Whether to maintain animations within the [child] subtree when it is not [visible].

fields.name: maintainSize
fields.desc: Whether to maintain space for where the widget would have been.

fields.name: maintainSemantics
fields.desc: Whether to maintain the semantics for the widget when it is hidden (e.g. for accessibility).

fields.name: maintainInteractivity
fields.desc: Whether to allow the widget to be interactive when hidden.

nodes.name: Control the visibility of internal child components based on visible
desc: By default, the child will lose its original area when hidden.

nodes.name: replacement can be used as a placeholder when hidden
